prodNameC: 協克單純疱疹病毒2型IgM 抗體試劑
ingredientsDesc:
1.Microplate wells
 coated with antigens: 12 microplate strips each containing 8 individual break-off wells in a frame, ready for use	12 x 8
2.Calibrator 
  (IgM,human), ready for use	1 x 2.0 ml
3. Positive control
 (IgM, human), ready for use	1 x 2.0 ml
4. Negative control
 (IgM, human), ready for use	1 x 2.0 ml
5. Enzyme conjugate
 peroxidase-labelled anti-human IgM (goat), ready for use	1 x 12 ml
6. Sample buffer
 Containing IgG/RF-Absorbent (Anti-human IgG antibody preparation obtained from goat)Ready for use	1 x 100 ml
7. Wash buffer
 10X concentrate	1 x 100 ml
8. Chromogen/substrate solution
TMB/H2O2, ready for use	1 x 12 ml
9. Stop solution
 0.5 M sulphuric acid, ready for use	1 x 12ml
applicantAddr: 台北市大安區復興南路2段157號5樓之3
efficacy: 此試劑是利用ELISA分析方法，半定量檢測人體血清或血漿HSV-2特異性醣蛋白gG2 IgM抗體。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.3305 單純皰疹病毒血清試劑
